document.title: Recent Project Preferences
document.paragraph:
This category gathers a list of recently opened projects in EiffelStudio. It also let's you decide how many recently opened projects to store in the list:
1
Label in the preferences window Complete description
Keep n projects This integral preference defines the maximum number of entries that should be displayed in the File/Recent projects menu.
Last opened projects A semi-colon separated list of the actual recently opened project
